# lian0123 Portfolio

This website is a professional engineering portfolio for lian0123.

## Profile
- Professional Backend Engineer
- Professional Full-Stack Engineer

## Focus Areas
- Backend system architecture
- API design and implementation
- Full-stack development and delivery
- Performance optimization
- Security engineering practices

## Primary Language
- Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant-TW)
- English (en)
- Japanese (ja)

## Main Pages
- /#about : Background, experience, technical capabilities
- /#portfolio : Project portfolio by category
- /#log : Engineering logs and technical updates
- /#contact : Contact information and message form

## Canonical
- https://lian0123.github.io/
